archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Allocate DG Resource
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Allocate DG Resource allocates DG required resources to achieve the desired DG management. Taking into account that different data types requires different operating models, roles and responsibilities

properties.value: Allocate DG Resource, including physical and logical resource, such as executive organization, talent resources, technology resource to determine data ownerships, roles, responsibilities, which ensure the implementation of data governance from the system of organization.
